entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
